content:
# POLICY OWNERS’ PROTECTION SCHEME

This policy is protected under the Policy Owners’ Protection Scheme which is administered by the Singapore Deposit Insurance Corporation (SDIC). Coverage for Your policy is automatic and no further action is required from You. For more information on the types of benefits that are covered under the scheme as well as the limits of coverage, where applicable, please contact HL Assurance Pte. Ltd. or visit the GIA or SDIC websites (www.gia.org.sg or www.sdic.org.sg).

# Sanction Limitation and Exclusion Clause
questions: What is the Policy Owners’ Protection Scheme?
Who administers the Policy Owners’ Protection Scheme?
Is any action required from me to ensure my policy is protected?
Where can I find more information about the benefits covered under the scheme?
What should I do if I want to know the limits of coverage for my policy?
Which companies can I contact for more information about the Policy Owners’ Protection Scheme?
Are there any exclusions mentioned in the Sanction Limitation and Exclusion Clause?
What websites can I visit to learn more about the Policy Owners’ Protection Scheme?
Does the Policy Owners’ Protection Scheme provide automatic coverage for all policies?
What is the role of HL Assurance Pte. Ltd. in relation to the Policy Owners’ Protection Scheme?
